name: Teacup's Adventure in Girasole City
description:
Join Teacup and her friends in this Twine adventure held to celebrate Teacup's one year anniversary. Originally held as an event at the Smarto Club Discord where everyone could vote for the path to take.

Teacup is a short and wholesome narrative adventure game with a focus on exploration and non-linear progression. Help a small and shy frog on her journey to find the ingredients she needs for her tea party!

Teacup is available now on all major platforms.
